name: SeasonBlocks
description:
The blocks are falling.

You know the drill. 

However, each season brings something new.

Interaction: WASD/Arrows

TRIJAM Info:
This game was made as part of the Trijam-70.
Unfortunately, this was more like Sixjam, because it took roughly 6 hours to make.
But I still wanted to participate, regardless of the timeframe, even if I score last :)
